value:
What a languid breeze... The people
here slumber quietly, stifled. Helpless
fools, all of them.

Extract everything you can from the
weak before you dispose of them.
That is the law of Múspell.

My daughters are mine to control. If
they outlive their usefulness, it falls
to me to extinguish them.

Múspell's royalty has ruled for
generations... But none have stoked
the flames as hot as I.

You are the victor. Now make clear
to all who bear witness to your
glory—to the victor goes everything!
Bow before me. I am Surtr. I am king.

I am flame itself! Even the gods will
burn.
Ha-hah! This is it! This is my strength!
As king, I am shamed.

You have fed the flames that will
burn your foes to cinders!

I am Surtr. I was sent to the land of
the dead and made to serve... It must
be your doing.

The strong dominate all. That is the
way of it. That is my way.$k$pYou defeated me. I submit to you. Do
as you please.$k$pI am the flame that will burn as you
desire—and burn anything that you
desire to ash.$k$pI do not need to hear your reasons.
The weak are slaughtered and the
strong manipulated and used.$k$pTurn my flame toward any target.
Burn it. Burn it all. Burn everything in
the nine worlds!
不遜！
笑止！
ぐああっ！
やりおるわ…
Burn till nothing remains.
You dare oppose a king?
Scatter like ash!
My blood boils!
Impossible!
ふはは
I am Surtr, King of Múspell. Bow before me.
Those who dare touch me will be swallowed by the flames.
My daughter... My people... They’re nothing but fuel for my flame.
This blood in my veins... It longs for the flames to grow hotter still.
The flame will devour everything. My enemies. My allies. And me.
Meeting you...was the beginning of the end for me.
The soul I once had...vanished in the flames of Múspell.
Understood.
I am flame!
All will burn.
